Moim zdaniem fajna gra, tylko toksyczni gracze/spamerzy czyli rosyjscy gracze denerwują.
osoby spamiące na prywatnych wiadomościach z tej gry reklamując przy tym strony (scam strony)
to masakra.
Podoba mi się to, że można pograć ze znajomymi pośmiać się ale moim zdaniem liczba zabójstw swojego gracza powinna zostać podniesiona do 5.

If you enjoy competitive games, csgo is the pillar of the original competitive spirit on the gaming community. Everything has its issues, including a competitive game called csgo. However, the community may be toxic but its rather refreshing that you can insult one another and play like brothers the round after(some exceptions}
Trash game waste my time and money

Its a amazing game to just spend hours upon hours in(at the moment (at the moment more than 2700 hours).
However it has its drawbacks like everything such as toxic players, which can realy ruin your day, or smurfs which is just annoying to play against. 
But even with those drawbacks i still really enjoy this game and highly recommend it.
